text: Christian Blangstrup Christian Blangstrup (29 October 1857, Nykøbing Falster – 1926) was a Danish encyclopedist. Born in Nykjobing, he was editor-in-chief of the Danish newspaper Berlingske Tidende from 1902 to 1912. He later edited the volumes 1–21 of the second edition of the Danish encyclopedia Salmonsens Konversationsleksikon. ==References== Category:1857 births Category:1926 deaths Category:People from Guldborgsund Municipality Category:Danish editors
title: Christian Blangstrup
